page.title: 10CLITHEROE'S RECREATION AREA
page.content: The Roefield and Edisford Bridge district is one of the most popular areas of Clitheroe both for townspeople and visitors. Here there is to be found an indoor swimming pool which was opened in 1972. Since then further amenities have been added. These include a pitch and putt course, children's playground, a caravan and camping site, football pitches, and more recently the Barn has been converted for recreational use. A model railway has been added at Roefield providing rides for visitors at weekends. The banks of the river at Edisford are very popular during summer. Here visitors can stroll along or sit and laze on the forms that are to be found there. In summer the cafe is a popular place for the visitors .
